message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a slightly better split. This offer won't be as good later.
Counteroffer, slightly in my favor, considering inflation
Inflation is eating our potential gains. Let's settle this now with a reasonable split.
Inflation is indeed a concern, I'll meet you halfway, but still slightly in my favor
This is it. A perfectly even split is the only fair option with inflation looming this large.
